name: iOS Metric Log
summary: A METRICLOG file is a diagnostic file created by an iOS device. It contains information about a crash that occurred on the device. By default, iOS devices automatically send METRICLOG files (and other analytics and diagnostic files) to Apple for review.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: METRICLOG file open in Apple TextEdit
images.alt: METRICLOG file open in Apple TextEdit
